action.action-desc: Ms. Brownley (for herself and Mr. Welch) introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Veterans' Affairs

form.official-title: To amend title 38, United States Code, to increase the mileage rate offered by the Department of Veterans Affairs through their Beneficiary Travel program for health related travel, and for other purposes.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the Driver Reimbursement Increase for Veteran Equity Act or the DRIVE Act.

section.header: VA payments or allowances for beneficiary travel
